content.question: Is your name now different to your name on your marriage certificate?
content.weddingDayName: The name on your certificate will be the name you used on your wedding day, eg a maiden name.

content.postACopy: You'll need to send a copy to the court. You can upload a digital photo or scan at the end of this application or you can send it by post.
